name: Guest Experience
description: Digital concierge, mobile check-in/out, and personalized guest communication platform.
longDescription:
Our Guest Experience module enhances every touchpoint in the guest journey. From digital check-in to personalized recommendations, this comprehensive platform helps you create memorable experiences that drive guest satisfaction and loyalty.

Upcoming features include:
- Mobile check-in and check-out
- Digital room keys
- In-app messaging and requests
- Local recommendations and activities booking
- Guest profile management
- Feedback collection and management
- Personalized promotional offers
